alert.note: Alert for Cascade County below 5000ft; East Glacier Park Region; Eastern Glacier, Western Toole, and Central Pondera; Judith Basin County and Judith Gap; Northern High Plains; Southern High Plains; Southern Rocky Mountain Front (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued March 14 at 12:45AM MDT until March 14 at 3:00PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM MDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Southwest winds 35 to 45 mph, with gusts to 60 mph. Wind gusts up to 75 mph are possible in wind prone areas along the eastern slopes of the Rocky Mountain Front. * WHERE...The Rocky Mountain Front and adjacent foothills and plains, Eastern Glacier, Western Toole, and Central Pondera, Cascade County below 5000ft, and Judith Basin County and Judith Gap. * WHEN...Until 3 PM MDT this afternoon. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property and cause power outages. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Reduced visibility due to blowing snow and partial lane blockages is also possible, especially on the Rocky Mountain Front.
info.instruction: People are urged to secure loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind.

area.areaDesc: Cascade County below 5000ft; East Glacier Park Region; Eastern Glacier, Western Toole, and Central Pondera; Judith Basin County and Judith Gap; Northern High Plains; Southern High Plains; Southern Rocky Mountain Front
